programme.sub-title: ACC Tournament: Wake Forest vs. Syracuse
programme.desc: The No. 8 Orange and No. 9 Demon Deacons run it back in the second round of the ACC Tournament. Syracuse beat Wake Forest 72-63 in their regular-season finales behind 27 points and 20 rebounds by center Jesse Edwards. The winner plays No. 1 Miami.

programme.sub-title: Summit League Tournament, Championship: Teams TBA

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Big East Tournament: Butler vs. St. John's
programme.desc: The 2023 Big East Tournament begins with a first-round game between the No. 8 Red Storm and No. 9 Bulldogs. This is the first postseason meeting between the schools, who split two regular-season tilts in 2022-23. Joel Soriano (SJU) totaled 31 points.

programme.title: Big East Tournament Bridge Show
programme.desc: Analysts review and preview games taking place at the Big East basketball tournament.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Big East Tournament: DePaul vs. Seton Hall
programme.desc: The No. 7 Pirates take on the No. 10 Blue Demons in the first round of the 2023 Big East Tournament. Seton Hall took both meetings during the regular season, including a 69-64 decision Feb. 5 as part of DePaul's ongoing 12-game losing skid.

programme.title: Big East Tournament Bridge Show
programme.desc: Analysts review and preview games taking place at the Big East basketball tournament.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Big East Tournament: Georgetown vs. Villanova
programme.desc: The No. 6 Wildcats face the No. 11 Hoyas in the first round of the 2023 Big East Tournament. Villanova has won four in a row over Georgetown after sweeping two 2022-23 meetings by a combined 20 points. Nova has taken six of its last eight overall.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Big East Tournament: Providence vs. Connecticut
programme.desc: The No. 4 Huskies match up with the No. 5 Friars in the quarterfinals of the 2023 Big East Tournament from Madison Square Garden. UConn enters the tourney on a five-game winning streak, which includes an 87-69 triumph over Providence on Feb. 22.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Big East Tournament: Villanova vs. Connecticut
programme.desc: The No. 2 Wildcats face the No. 1 Huskies in the Big East Tournament final. Maddy Siegrist had a 37-point double-double as Villanova edged Creighton 63-61 in the semifinals. All five UConn starters scored at least 11 points in a win over Marquette.

programme.title: 2022 CONCACAF Champions League: Seattle's Road to Glory
NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Cup Series shifts to Nevada for the Pennzoil 400 at Las Vegas Motor Speedway. Kyle Busch is red-hot after winning last week's Pala Casino 400 in California. Busch has nine top-five finishes at this event, including a victory in 2009.

programme.title: NASCAR Xfinity Racing Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Xfinity Series runs through Arizona for the United Rentals 200. Austin Hill claimed his second checkered flag of 2023 at the Alsco Uniforms 300 on March 4. Justin Allgaier has finished in the top three in all three races this season.

programme.title: Etched in Gold
programme.desc: After winning their third title in 1970, Brazil, the FIFA World Cup's most successful nation was permanently awarded the Jules Rimet trophy; from 1974 until the present day a new trophy, designed by Silvio Gazzaniga has been the ultimate prize.
